sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Avatar, AppBar, Button, Card, CardContent, Icon, IconButton, List, ListItem, ListItemSecondaryAction, ListItemText, Toolbar, Typography} from '@material-ui/core'; import {FuseAnimateGroup} from '@fuse'; import axiosInstance from 'app/main/axios'; import EducationFormDialog from '../forms/EducationForm'; import GeneralInfoFormDialog from '../forms/GeneralInfoForm'; import WorkFormDialog from '../forms/workExperienceForm'; import ContactFormDialog from '../forms/ContactForm'; function AboutTab(props) { const [mydata, setMyData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axiosInstance.get('profile-fetch/').then(res => { setMyData(res.data) }); }, []); return (
General Information
About {mydata.about}
Signature Line {mydata.signatureLine}
Gender {mydata.gender}
Date of Birth {mydata.birthday}
Designation {mydata.designation}
Education
College Name {mydata.collegeName}
Program {mydata.program}
Specialisation {mydata.specialisation}
Graduation Year {mydata.graduationYear}
Work
Job Title {mydata.jobTitle}
Company {mydata.company}
Job Description {mydata.jobDescription}
Job Location {mydata.jobLocation}
Start Date {mydata.startDate}
End Date {mydata.endDate}
Contact
Address {mydata.address}
Tel. {mydata.phone}
Website {mydata.website}
Email {mydata.email}
Friends {/* {friends.map((friend) => ( ))} */}
); } export default AboutTab;
